page.title: 09MY LIFE IN CLUNBURY
page.content: My name is{Jacqueline}and I am 11 years old. For breakfast I usually have toast and tea. I check my two horses, clean my teeth, wash, brush my hair and make my packed lunch. At 8:40 I go down the drive to wait for the daily bus. There are 10 children on my bus. I go into school and practice the hymns for assembly. At 9:00{Mrs Hibbs}comes out and calls everyone in. 7 of us play recorders in assembly, we have 35 children in the school. we do maths and English in the mornings. At lunch break we take turns on the{B.B.C computer.}About half the school have packed lunches; the others have a cooked meal brought in a van. After lunch we have a story, then games, art, swimming (we go in a bus every week) or topic work. After school I ride{Sunney}and{Miggy}then I have tea, then I go to at bed at 9:30.
